Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.graph

Interface GraphWorld

All Superinterfaces:
GraphView
public interface GraphWorld extends GraphView
Holds and manages all block graphs for a given world.

    • connectNodes

      @Nullable default @Nullable LinkHolder<LinkKey> connectNodes(@NotNull @NotNull NodePos a, @NotNull @NotNull NodePos b)
      Connects two nodes to each other.

      Note: in order for manually connected links to not be removed when the connected nodes are updated, LinkKey.isAutomaticRemoval(LinkHolder) should return false for the given key.

      Parameters:
      a - the first node to be connected.
      b - the second node to be connected.
      Returns:
      the link created, or null if no link could be created.

    • connectNodes

      @Nullable default @Nullable LinkHolder<LinkKey> connectNodes(@NotNull @NotNull NodePos a, @NotNull @NotNull NodePos b, @NotNull @NotNull LinkKey key)
      Connects two nodes to each other.

      Note: in order for manually connected links to not be removed when the connected nodes are updated, LinkKey.isAutomaticRemoval(LinkHolder) should return false for the given key.

      Parameters:
      a - the first node to be connected.
      b - the second node to be connected.
      key - the key of the connection.
      Returns:
      the link created, or null if no link could be created.

    • connectNodes

      @Nullable @Nullable LinkHolder<LinkKey> connectNodes(@NotNull @NotNull NodePos a, @NotNull @NotNull NodePos b, @NotNull @NotNull LinkKey key, @Nullable @Nullable LinkEntity entity)
      Connects two nodes to each other.

      Note: in order for manually connected links to not be removed when the connected nodes are updated, LinkKey.isAutomaticRemoval(LinkHolder) should return false for the given key.

      Parameters:
      a - the first node to be connected.
      b - the second node to be connected.
      key - the key of the connection.
      entity - the link's entity, if any.
      Returns:
      the link created, or null if no link could be created.
